title: Validate Structured Tasks Against JSON Schema
description: Ensure all structured task YAML files comply with the defined JSON schema without validation errors.

steps.description: Run structured task validation command to validate all task YAML files
Verify that validation reports zero errors and all structured tasks pass schema validation

title: Validate Structured Checklists Against JSON Schema
description: Confirm all structured checklists are validated successfully against checklist JSON schema, ensuring no errors or schema mismatches.

steps.description: Run checklist validation command on all checklist YAML files
Ensure validation completes without errors, confirming checklist structure correctness

title: Verify Working Memory Initialization
description: Check that working memory initialization creates properly formatted JSON files in the designated .ai directory, preserving session context.

steps.description: Execute working memory initialization command
Verify the presence of working_memory_*.json files in .ai/ directory
Validate JSON content for correctness and session context preservation

title: Test Qdrant Vector Database Integration for Dependency and Search Data
description: Ensure ingestion scripts properly add dependency graphs and search embeddings to Qdrant vector database, maintaining data integrity and retrievability.

steps.description: Run ingest-to-qdrant script with sample dependency and search result data
Confirm successful ingestion output message
Query Qdrant database to verify data presence and correctness

title: Generate and Validate Search Tools from PRD Content
description: Automatically generate search tool configurations from PRD keyword extraction, then validate generated tools against their schema.

steps.description: Run search tool generation with sample PRD input
Verify output search-tools.yaml file is created and contains mappings from PRD keywords
Run search tool validation command on generated file
Check validation results confirm no errors in search tool configurations

title: Validate StoryContracts Using JSON Schemas
description: Ensure all story contracts have required fields and formats by validating against the official StoryContract schema.

steps.description: Execute story contract validation with all available contracts
Confirm validation passes with no schema errors and all required fields present

title: Automate Dynamic Plan Adaptation and Task Decomposition
description: Verify that the dynamic plan adaptation module correctly decomposes large or complex tasks into sub-tasks according to predefined thresholds and rules.

steps.description: Submit complex task requiring decomposition to system
Confirm output contains multiple manageable sub-tasks instead of single large task
Verify sub-tasks adhere to schema and maintain logical dependency ordering

title: Verify User Input Elicitation in Workflows
description: Ensure workflow automation elicits required user inputs at correct points with no missing or skipped interaction required for task completion.

steps.description: Initiate workflow that requires user input
Check that all prompts marked with elicit: true appear and capture valid user input
Confirm subsequent workflow steps proceed only after user input is submitted

title: QA Agent Review Workflow Without Code Modification
description: Validate that QA agents can review code and generate feedback reports without making any changes to code artifacts, enforcing role separation rules.

steps.description: Trigger QA review command on existing codebase
Ensure generated feedback logs exist and contain review comments
Verify no code files are modified during review process

title: Perform Dependency Impact Analysis Before Code Changes
description: Test that dependency analysis system correctly identifies affected components from proposed code changes and reports impacts accurately before implementation.

steps.description: Run dependency analysis command with sample code change inputs
Run impact checking command using analysis results
Confirm impact analysis report lists all potentially affected components correctly

title: Verify Orchestrator Logs and Output Message Standards
description: Check that workflow orchestrator runs produce verbose, standardized logs and console outputs that contain all necessary workflow state information.

steps.description: Run orchestrator command under typical workflow scenario
Inspect logs for presence of timestamps, workflow step details, and error/warning messages if any
Verify console output messages conform to standard format documented

title: Validate Persistent Memory Hygiene and Health Checks
description: Test memory system’s health monitoring and cleaning mechanisms trigger appropriately, maintaining performance and preventing hallucinations during long workflows.

steps.description: Run memory health check scripts periodically during workflow
Verify health reports indicate positive status with no anomalies
Trigger automatic memory cleaning process
Validate that memory cleaning occurs as scheduled and improves memory hygiene without data loss

title: Schema Validation Suite Coverage Test
description: Execute comprehensive schema validation covering all YAML/JSON artifacts including tasks, checklists, story contracts, and configurations to guarantee full compliance.

steps.description: Run complete schema validation command across all schema-supported files
Ensure no schema validation errors are reported for any artifact types

title: Test Elicitation Flags Are Properly Marked in User Interaction Points
description: Check that all user interaction points in workflows are correctly flagged with elicit: true to ensure user input elicitation happens seamlessly in iterative flows.

steps.description: Run audit elicit flags script on workflows
Validate that all required interaction steps have elicit flag set to true
Confirm no missing or unmarked user input points

title: Task Scanner Ensures No Deprecated or Improper Task Usage
description: Verify that the system scans for and flags any deprecated or improper usage of tasks ensuring all tasks conform to the structured task schema and guidelines.

steps.description: Run task scanner script on codebase and task definitions
Ensure scan report shows no deprecated task usage or unstructured tasks

title: Configuration Path Validation for core-config.yaml
description: Check that all path references in core-config.yaml are correct, accessible, and valid according to validation rules.

steps.description: Run configuration validation command for core-config.yaml paths
Verify no invalid or broken path references are found

title: Test Automatic Implementation of Next Approved Story
description: Confirm that system automates implementation of the next approved story correctly, generating valid story files and progressing workflow as expected.

steps.description: Run dev-next-story script to automatically implement next story
Check resulting story file is generated and valid per schema
Verify workflow transitions to next state correctly

title: Memory Persistence Across Agent Invocations
description: Test that working memory persists correctly between agent calls, preserving context in session JSON files without data corruption or loss.

steps.description: Run memory persistence test executing multiple sequential agent calls
Confirm state is maintained across calls and final memory content is consistent and correct

title: Workflow Orchestration with Linear and Iterative Dev-QA Flows
description: Validate correct orchestration of workflows in both linear (Dev→QA) and iterative (Dev↔QA) modes, ensuring elicitation, feedback loops, and role separation function as expected.

steps.description: Run workflow orchestrator with linear flow on sample story
Confirm workflow completes all steps with proper user inputs and transitions
Run orchestrator with iterative flow mode on sample story
Validate multiple Dev and QA cycles execute with input elicitation and feedback loops

title: Generated Search Tools Match Extracted PRD Keywords
description: Ensure that generated search tools accurately reflect keywords and topics extracted from PRD content, supporting enhanced developer knowledge discovery.

steps.description: Generate search tools from sample PRD content
Verify generated search tool keywords and domains correspond to PRD extracted keywords
